page.title: 11REFLECTING ROADSTUDS
page.content: {Reflecting Roadstuds}was founded by{percy shaw}in{1934. He was returning home one night during a black out in the{2nd world {war}it was difficult to see the road suddenly a{'cats' eyes}were reflected in his headlights. He decided it would be a benifit to drivers if the centre of the roads was marked by{reflecting {studs. On the 5/6/85,Reflecting Roadstuds employed 124 people about{50%}women. The factory was built in{1934,} opening the same year. The glass is bought from{Malaysia, the cast iron is manufactured at the factory,when they are finished they go through the{United Kingdom},they hope to send them throughout the world,but mainly to{Australia}and{Greenland.
